THINK LUTON

I was approached by a design studio (Gravatt Design) that had the task of promoting investment in Luton Town. I used flash to develop the navigation as they needed a modern looking site, but kept the content in HTML for better SEO. Due to this being a Council website it had to adhere to accessibility issues.

  • This site involved:
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • PHP
  • Flash (Actionscript)
  • Photoshop

www.thinkluton.co.uk
